issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Dataset writing should require a writer schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8381](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8381). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Dataset writing should always take an explicit writer schema instead of the first fragment's schema.
1. The MakeWritePlanImpl should not try removing columns that are found in the partition, this is left to the caller by passing an explicit schema.
